name: 1D Target Shooting
description:
How To Play

Press space when the colored targets overlap the goal

You lose half of the worth of the target if you miss it
You lose 12 points if you hit space.

Point score is shown by the 6 pixels at the top from top to bottom meaning left to right.

Target points:
green - 1
blue - 5
red - 10
purple - 25

Color coding for UI:
red - 0
orange - 1
black - 2
white - 3
blue - four
yellow - five
green - six
brown - seven
purple - eight
gray - nine
